name: Commonwealth ex rel. Icenhour, Appellant, v. Maroney
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Icenhour v. Maroney

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Icenhour, Appellant, v. Maroney.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
In the light of onr decisions in Commonwealth ex rel. O’Lock v. Rundle, 415 Pa. 515, 204 A. 2d 439 (1964), and Commonwealth ex rel. Goodfellow v. Rundle, 415 Pa. 528, 204 A. 2d 446 (1964), allocatur is granted in the above case. The orders of the Superior Court and the Court of Common Pleas of Beaver County are reversed and the record is remanded to the court of original jurisdiction with directions to issue the writ and order a retrial.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Elmer G. Ieenhour, petitioner, in propria persona.
Edward J. Toed, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert J. Masters, District Attorney, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Icenhour, Appellant, v. Maroney.
Submitted July 15, 1964.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Elmer G. Ieenhour, petitioner, in propria persona.
Edward J. Toed, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert J. Masters, District Attorney, for respondent.
November 10, 1964:
